episodes.title: Overview
episodes.transcript:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:06.384
[MUSIC]

2
00:00:06.384 --> 00:00:09.541
>> Hi, I'm Josh Marpet and
welcome to the Business for

3
00:00:09.541 --> 00:00:12.520
Technologists talk series
here at BizPro.tv.

4
00:00:12.520 --> 00:00:16.000
With me is Scott Lions,
we're the Chief Operating Officer and

5
00:00:16.000 --> 00:00:18.310
Chief Executive Officer of Red Lion.

6
00:00:18.310 --> 00:00:21.600
And we're gonna be talking about all sorts
of things about starting a business,

7
00:00:21.600 --> 00:00:23.570
running a business, and
eventually exiting a business.

8
00:00:23.570 --> 00:00:25.400
But first, let me tell you who we are.

9
00:00:25.400 --> 00:00:26.690
Scott, why don't you start?

10
00:00:26.690 --> 00:00:28.090
>> Sure.
Thanks, Josh.

11
00:00:28.090 --> 00:00:34.190
I am the CEO of Red Lion, I'm a graduate
of the school of business hard knocks.

12
00:00:34.190 --> 00:00:41.860
I have assisted in multiple B-Side events,
both as a goon and as a regular attendee.

13
00:00:41.860 --> 00:00:46.260
I am part of the peer review board for

14
00:00:46.260 --> 00:00:50.200
SNAC, which is a journal of information
security, which is coming out later.

15
00:00:50.200 --> 00:00:52.930
I do hold certifications
in information security.

16
00:00:52.930 --> 00:00:54.040
I won't say which.

17
00:00:54.040 --> 00:00:57.129
And my real passions are people and
business.

18
00:00:58.740 --> 00:01:00.300
>> And I'm Josh Marpet.

19
00:01:00.300 --> 00:01:01.480
I'm the CO of Red Lion.

20
00:01:02.600 --> 00:01:04.260
I've been around the block more than once.

21
00:01:04.260 --> 00:01:06.766
I'm an ex-cop, an ex-fireman,
an ex-horse dentist.

22
00:01:06.766 --> 00:01:08.120
That's not a joke, I swear.

23
00:01:09.320 --> 00:01:10.099
I'm, let's see.

24
00:01:10.099 --> 00:01:14.089
Good lord, I'm a former board member
of Hackers for Charity, Las Vegas,

25
00:01:14.089 --> 00:01:17.180
the Cloud Security Alliance,
Delaware Valley.

26
00:01:17.180 --> 00:01:20.055
I'm one of the primary organizers
of security B-Sides Delaware.

27
00:01:20.055 --> 00:01:23.840
Scott and I run multiple companies and
occasionally, we sleep.

28
00:01:23.840 --> 00:01:25.390
it's an amazing thing.

29
00:01:25.390 --> 00:01:28.316
So let's talk about Business for
Technology.

30
00:01:28.316 --> 00:01:29.623
The Business for

31
00:01:29.623 --> 00:01:34.210
Technologists series is literally about
if you're a technologist with an idea,

32
00:01:34.210 --> 00:01:39.060
a product, a prototype or whatever but
I wanna bring it to commercial success.

33
00:01:39.060 --> 00:01:42.670
How do I get there, and
what obstacles am I gonna see on the way?

34
00:01:42.670 --> 00:01:45.082
Scott, why don't you talk about
the talks we are going to be giving.

35
00:01:45.082 --> 00:01:45.790
>> Sure thing.

36
00:01:45.790 --> 00:01:50.670
So, in this series, what we're
really trying to do is to say here's

37
00:01:50.670 --> 00:01:54.530
how you start a business,
to here's how you end the business.

38
00:01:54.530 --> 00:01:58.890
So we want to cover everything from
product creation, to sales management,

39
00:01:58.890 --> 00:01:59.969
to business development.

40
00:02:01.310 --> 00:02:04.800
And everything in between, talking about
the pitfalls, what to look out for,

41
00:02:04.800 --> 00:02:09.250
how to move things forward and
really understand how to make the deal.

42
00:02:09.250 --> 00:02:12.792
>> Yeah,
basically it's a compilation of wisdom and

43
00:02:12.792 --> 00:02:16.100
failures [LAUGH] that we have had and
problems that we've encountered.

44
00:02:16.100 --> 00:02:17.940
Remember, you learn from failure.

45
00:02:17.940 --> 00:02:21.460
Well, I'd prefer that you learn from
our failures rather than your own.

46
00:02:21.460 --> 00:02:24.820
This is a way for you to get an idea
of what pitfalls are in the way.

47
00:02:24.820 --> 00:02:28.930
Everything from I've got an idea, how much
money do I need to bring it to creation,

48
00:02:28.930 --> 00:02:32.300
to fulfillment, to a prototype,
to a minimum viable product?

49
00:02:32.300 --> 00:02:33.270
What do I need to do?

50
00:02:33.270 --> 00:02:34.880
How do I get validation?

51
00:02:34.880 --> 00:02:38.840
Everything from how do I start it,
what's the paperwork I need to do it,

52
00:02:38.840 --> 00:02:42.820
to what kind of ways can I get out of this
business, how do I exit hopefully with

53
00:02:42.820 --> 00:02:46.390
a lot of money in my pocket and
a successful entrepreneurship on my belt?

54
00:02:47.420 --> 00:02:49.590
In that fashion,
we're gonna go through a series of talks,

55
00:02:49.590 --> 00:02:51.510
talking about all these different stages.

56
00:02:51.510 --> 00:02:54.610
Now there is a series of six
talks that are the primary core

57
00:02:54.610 --> 00:02:57.877
of the B-for-T curricula, but
there's gonna be additional talks as well.

58
00:02:57.877 --> 00:02:59.357
Things about that business paperwork.

59
00:02:59.357 --> 00:03:03.080
Short talks about what types of tools
you can use for a very low cost.

60
00:03:03.080 --> 00:03:06.510
There's going to be talks about
what type of exits there are and

61
00:03:06.510 --> 00:03:08.290
all sorts of different topics.

62
00:03:08.290 --> 00:03:12.100
I think it's gonna be a fantastic time and
we hope you'll enjoy it with us.

63
00:03:12.100 --> 00:03:13.070
Scott, anything else?

64
00:03:13.070 --> 00:03:15.400
>> Yeah, really for this series, Josh,

65
00:03:15.400 --> 00:03:17.890
what we want people to be
able to take away from this,

66
00:03:17.890 --> 00:03:22.960
you as the viewer, is to be able to sit
back and say okay I have a product.

67
00:03:22.960 --> 00:03:25.640
I know where to go to put
my business together,

68
00:03:25.640 --> 00:03:27.790
and then how do I run the business?

69
00:03:27.790 --> 00:03:31.450
And that's the real meat
behind the takeaways for

70
00:03:31.450 --> 00:03:36.300
you as the viewer to be able to
understand business for technologists.

71
00:03:36.300 --> 00:03:38.730
>> Thank you,
I think that covers pretty much it.

72
00:03:38.730 --> 00:03:41.880
If you'd like to watch the series,
just click below and

73
00:03:41.880 --> 00:03:46.685
you can sign up with an account for
BizPro.tv or ITPro.tv and

74
00:03:46.685 --> 00:03:50.160
then you can watch the entire set of
videos from us as well as from all

75
00:03:50.160 --> 00:03:53.963
the other amazing content creators
here at BizPro, on ITPro.tv.

76
00:03:53.963 --> 00:03:55.334
Thank you.

77
00:03:55.334 --> 00:03:58.632
[SOUND]

episodes.description: The Technology is only worth 5 percent
episodes.title: The Technology is only worth 5 percent
